# Agentic AI Improvements Checklist: Voice Assistant

**Purpose**: Validate the completeness, clarity, and consistency of requirements for agentic AI improvements to the voice assistant
**Created**: 2026-01-04
**Feature**: specs/002-agentic-ai-improvements/spec.md

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/sp.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are noise filtering requirements fully specified with specific techniques (spectral gating, Wiener filter) in the spec? [Completeness, Spec §FR-100]
- [ ] CHK002 Are acoustic echo cancellation requirements completely defined with specific implementation approaches? [Completeness, Spec §FR-101]
- [ ] CHK003 Are STT confidence tracking requirements complete with all confidence threshold behaviors defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-102]
- [ ] CHK004 Are alternative STT engine requirements fully specified with configuration options and fallback mechanisms? [Completeness, Spec §FR-103]
- [ ] CHK005 Are semantic memory requirements complete with vector store specifications and RAG implementation details? [Completeness, Spec §FR-110-114]
- [ ] CHK006 Are entity extraction requirements complete with all supported entity types clearly defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-120-124]
- [ ] CHK007 Are agentic planning requirements complete with all failure handling strategies specified? [Completeness, Spec §FR-130-134]
- [ ] CHK008 Are external tool integration requirements complete with all supported services and authentication methods? [Completeness, Spec §FR-140-144]
- [ ] CHK009 Are observability requirements complete with all metrics, tracing, and alerting specifications? [Completeness, Spec §FR-150-154]
- [ ] CHK010 Are testing requirements complete with all audio integration test scenarios defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-160-164]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK011 Is "90% WER accuracy" in noisy environments quantified with specific noise level definitions? [Clarity, Spec §SC-100]
- [ ] CHK012 Are "prominent display" and "visual hierarchy" requirements quantified with specific metrics? [Clarity, Spec §FR-120-124]
- [ ] CHK013 Is "noise filtering" requirement clarified with specific dB thresholds and filtering techniques? [Clarity, Spec §FR-100]
- [ ] CHK014 Are "sensitive actions" clearly defined with specific examples of what requires user confirmation? [Clarity, Spec §FR-133]
- [ ] CHK015 Is "relevant context" in semantic memory retrieval quantified with specific precision metrics? [Clarity, Spec §SC-101]
- [ ] CHK016 Are "complex goals" clearly defined with specific criteria for when planning is triggered? [Clarity, Spec §FR-130]
- [ ] CHK017 Is "graceful fallback" defined with specific behaviors for different failure scenarios? [Clarity, Spec §FR-103]
- [ ] CHK018 Are "required slots" clearly defined with specific validation criteria? [Clarity, Spec §FR-121-122]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK019 Do STT confidence requirements (FR-102) align with the WER success criteria (SC-100)? [Consistency, Spec §FR-102 vs §SC-100]
- [ ] CHK020 Do semantic memory retrieval requirements (FR-114) align with precision success criteria (SC-101)? [Consistency, Spec §FR-114 vs §SC-101]
- [ ] CHK021 Do entity extraction accuracy requirements (SC-102) align with extraction functionality (FR-120-124)? [Consistency, Spec §FR-120-124 vs §SC-102]
- [ ] CHK022 Do plan execution success criteria (SC-103) align with planning functionality (FR-130-134)? [Consistency, Spec §FR-130-134 vs §SC-103]
- [ ] CHK023 Do external tool success criteria (SC-104) align with integration requirements (FR-140-144)? [Consistency, Spec §FR-140-144 vs §SC-104]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK024 Are all acceptance scenarios in User Stories measurable with objective verification methods? [Measurability, Spec §User Stories 1-7]
- [ ] CHK025 Can "90% WER accuracy" be objectively measured and verified? [Measurability, Spec §SC-100]
- [ ] CHK026 Can "85% precision" for semantic memory retrieval be objectively measured? [Measurability, Spec §SC-101]
- [ ] CHK027 Can "95% accuracy" for entity extraction be objectively measured? [Measurability, Spec §SC-102]
- [ ] CHK028 Can "90% success rate" for planner completion be objectively measured? [Measurability, Spec §SC-103]
- [ ] CHK029 Can "P95 end-to-end latency <3 seconds" be objectively measured? [Measurability, Spec §SC-105]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK030 Are error handling requirements defined for all API failure modes in external integrations? [Coverage, Spec §FR-144]
- [ ] CHK031 Are recovery scenarios defined for plan execution failures? [Coverage, Spec §FR-132]
- [ ] CHK032 Are rollback requirements defined for failed plan steps? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK033 Are zero-context scenarios addressed for semantic memory initialization? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK034 Are concurrent user interaction scenarios addressed in the requirements? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK035 Are requirements defined for partial data loading failures in semantic memory? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK036 Are multi-user scenarios addressed for the agentic AI system? [Coverage, Spec §Assumptions]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK037 Are requirements specified for semantic memory when vector database is unavailable? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK038 Are requirements defined for handling extremely long user queries in entity extraction? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK039 Are requirements specified for handling invalid or malformed entity extractions? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK040 Are requirements defined for handling circular dependencies in agentic planning? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK041 Are requirements specified for handling API rate limits in external tool integrations? [Edge Case, Spec §FR-143]
- [ ] CHK042 Are requirements defined for handling memory exhaustion during semantic retrieval? [Edge Case, Gap]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK043 Are performance requirements quantified with specific timing thresholds for all operations? [NFR, Spec §NFR-100-105]
- [ ] CHK044 Are reliability requirements specified with uptime and error rate targets? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK045 Are security requirements specified for all data handling and API integrations? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK046 Are privacy requirements specified for semantic memory and conversation data? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK047 Are scalability requirements defined with specific concurrent user targets? [NFR, Spec §NFR-103]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK048 Are all external API dependencies documented with their requirements and validation? [Dependency, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK049 Are vector database assumptions validated with requirements for local embedding? [Dependency, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK050 Are LLM API assumptions validated with requirements for structured output? [Dependency, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK051 Are network connectivity assumptions documented with offline behavior requirements? [Dependency, Spec §Assumptions]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [ ] CHK052 Is the term "complex goals" clearly defined to avoid ambiguity in planning requirements? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-130]
- [ ] CHK053 Are there conflicts between local-only processing assumptions and cloud API requirements? [Conflict, Spec §Assumptions vs §FR-140-144]
- [ ] CHK054 Is "relevant context" clearly defined to avoid ambiguity in semantic memory retrieval? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-112-113]
- [ ] CHK055 Are there conflicts between memory footprint requirements and semantic memory storage needs? [Conflict, Spec §NFR-104 vs §FR-110-114]

## Traceability Requirements

- [ ] CHK056 Is a requirement & acceptance criteria ID scheme established and consistently used? [Traceability, Spec §FR-###, §SC-###]
- [ ] CHK057 Are all functional requirements linked to corresponding success criteria? [Traceability]
- [ ] CHK058 Are all user stories linked to relevant functional requirements? [Traceability]
